message: In the hallway, we find the bike on its side where we left it.
Mink stands it up and turns the key.
But the engine refuses to start.

name: ミンク
message: "...Shit."
...Hearing footsteps, I look up. A group of guards has appeared at the end of the corridor.
And leading them is...

name: 悪島
message: "Ooooooh my! It REALLY has been a while!"

name: ミンク
message: "...Fuck. You again?"
Mink curses under his breath. But a moment later, his expression changes.
Behind the guards... are members of Scratch.
They must've taken quite a beating. Their faces are swollen and bruised.

name: 悪島
message: "I dunno how the hell you got away last time, but this time, I've got hostages."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Boss... we're so sorry..."

name: ミンク
message: "...Don't recognize any of your cops."

name: 悪島
message: "All shiny and new. None of your dogs here this time."

name: ミンク
message: "You really are a stubborn piece of shit. I'm impressed."

name: 悪島
message: "Hey, thanks! Too bad I can't say the same. ...Hey."
On Akushima's signal, the officers aim their guns at Mink's men.

name: 悪島
message: "If either of you lifts a finger, they're dead. BANG! BOOM! OVER!"

name: 悪島
message: "Soooo... you're not gonna move a muscle, right?"
Akushima grins triumphantly.
I glance at Mink, asking with my eyes―
"What do we do?"
Mink keeps his stare fixed on Akushima.

name: ミンク
message: "If we can't move..."
Now he shoots me a glance.
I catch his meaning.
If we can't move... there's only one thing we can do.
I focus my mind and stare into Akushima's eyes.
We have to get out of here, by any means necessary.
Any means.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let's see you move."

name: 悪島
message: "Huh?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But you can't. You can't take a step... or lift so much as a finger."

name: 悪島
message: "The fuck? You crazy?"
Akushima looks at his men, then at me, a contemptuous smile on his face.
I don't need to get all of them. Just a few will be enough.

name: 蒼葉
message: "None of you can move. Your feet are stuck to the ground. You can't move an inch from where you're standing."

name: 悪島
message: "Oh, shut up! I've had enough of your bullshit! You're under arrest!"
Spittle flies from Akushima's mouth. A moment later, he lowers his hips to charge.
...And there, he realizes that something's wrong.
He looks down at feet. Slowly, his expression changes.

name: 悪島
message: "WHAT THE FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK?!"
Akushima is stuck―like his feet are frozen in place.
As much as his upper body struggles, the soles of his shoes remain planted on the ground.
And several of his men, especially those closest to him, are experiencing the same issue.

name: 悪島
message: "Hey! Hey! HEY! HEY! What the hell is this―GAH!"
Taking advantage of his confusion, one of Mink's guys headbutts Akushima from behind.
Akushima instantly crumples to the floor.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "We'll take it from here, boss!"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Toue's upstairs! Go on ahead! We'll finish the plan once we're done here!"
Mink's men start beating the crap out of the immobilized officers.
After exchanging a look with his men, Mink turns to me.
